DOC.brief_summary: Visible-light-filtering IOLs implant increasingly often cataract surgery . Several study examine effect light-filters contrast colour vision . However , study outcome vary . The present study investigate effect two light-filtering IOL colour perception contrast acuity use highly sensitive measurement method .
DOC.brief_title: Light Filters Intraocular Lenses ( IOLs ) Its Influence Colour Contrast Vision .
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize , double-masked study intraindividual comparison . Implantation Polylens Y30 IOL one eye Orange Series Model PC 440 Y contralateral eye .
DOC.criteria: bilateral agerelated cataract age 55 80 year expect postoperative visual acuity least 1.0 amblyopia corneal scar diabetes arterial hypertonia pseudoexfoliationsyndrome earlier ocular surgery laser treatment intraocular tumor color abnormality expect postoperative visual acuity lower 1.0
